snippet.title: Nancy Drew: The Deadly Device Official Trailer | Nancy Drew Mystery Games
snippet.description:
Watch the official trailer for the Nancy Drew adventure game, The Deadly Device. Solve the murder mystery when an elusive killer shocks a high-tech lab! 
Order the game @ https://www.herinteractive.com/shop-games/nancy-drew-the-deadly-device/

Fear lingers in a remote laboratory after a physicist's suspicious demise. When a police investigation comes up cold, the lab owner calls on detective Nancy Drew to expose the terrifying truth of the top-secret Tesla-inspired facility. 

visit us: http://www.herinteractive.com
follow us: http://www.twitter.com/herinteractive
like us: http://www.facebook.com/nancydrewpcgames
subscribe to us: http://www.youtube.com/herinteractivegames
